00100 // This is fixed on ed2k v1, but can be any number on ED2Kv2

00121     uint16 m_linked;
00122 #ifdef DEBUG_ZOMBIE_CLIENTS
00123     bool    m_linkedDebug;
00124     std::multiset<wxString> m_linkedFrom;
00125     void    Link(const wxString& from)      { m_linked++; m_linkedFrom.insert(from); }
00126     void    Unlink(const wxString& from);
00127     wxString GetLinkedFrom() {
00128         wxString ret;
00129         for (std::multiset<wxString>::iterator it = m_linkedFrom.begin(); it != m_linkedFrom.end(); it++) {
00130             ret += *it + wxT(", ");
00131         }
00132         return ret;
00133     }
00134 #else
00135     void    Link()      { m_linked++; }
00136     void    Unlink();
00137 #endif

00580     bool        ShouldReceiveCryptUDPPackets() const;

00847 #define MAKE_CLIENT_VERSION(mjr, min, upd) \
00848     ((uint32)(mjr)*100U*10U*100U + (uint32)(min)*100U*10U + (uint32)(upd)*100U)
